name: Tracking Mark
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You gain a supernatural ability to detect tracks and other clues left behind by the target. You treat the DCs of all Survival checks made to track the target as if they were 5 lower than normal, and you gain a +5 bonus on Perception checks made to notice the target if it is using Stealth or recognize it if it is using Disguise.
text_zh: 通过这个法术，你对于目标生物的行动轨迹获得了超自然的敏锐识别力。你用来追踪目标生物的生存检定DC降低5点，并且如果目标使用潜行或易容技能企图避开你的探知，你在发觉该生物伪装的察觉检定上获得+5加值。
